nodes.text: Rafa IV was a temperate planet in the Rafa system of the Centrality, located in the Outer Rim Territories. It was a colony world of the Sharu species.
Before the Sharu uprising in 4 BBY, its main city Teguta Lusat was the capital of the Rafa system. Rafa IV was governed by Duttes Mer, colonial governor of the Rafa.
The PC game Star Wars: Rebellion mistakenly places Rafa IV in the Quelli sector (a misspelling of the true Quelii sector).
